abstract: NBC Universal and Apple were unable to come to an agreement on pricing, leading to the a withdrawal that highlights escalating tensions between Apple and media companies.
snippet: NBC Universal and Apple were unable to come to an agreement on pricing, leading to the a withdrawal that highlights escalating tensions between Apple and media companies.
lead_paragraph: NBC Universal, unable to come to an agreement with Apple on pricing, has decided not to renew its contract to sell digital downloads of television shows on iTunes.

headline.main: NBC Will Not Renew ITunes Contract
headline.print_headline: NBC to End ITunes Sales Of Its Shows

abstract: The dispute between Apple and NBC Universal over the pricing of video on iTunes grew more heated as Apple announced it would not add any new NBC shows to the online store’s inventory.
snippet: The dispute between Apple and NBC Universal over the pricing of video on iTunes grew more heated as Apple announced it would not add any new NBC shows to the online store’s inventory.
lead_paragraph: The dispute between Apple and NBC Universal over the pricing of video on iTunes grew more heated today as Apple announced it would not add any new NBC television shows to the online store’s inventory.

headline.main: Apple Bars New NBC Shows From iTunes

abstract: Apple won’t carry NBC’s videos, so there.
snippet: Apple won’t carry NBC’s videos, so there.
lead_paragraph: As The Times reported this morning, NBC decided not to sell its videos on Apple’s iTunes when their contract expires this December.
